weapon.primal.name: Primal Mangosteen
weapon.primal.description: Generates electric rings to attack nearby enemies and paralyze them. Right-click: Summon Lightning (CD: 60s)
weapon.electric-gatling-pea.name: Electric Gatling Pea
weapon.electric-gatling-pea.description: Fires 4 piercing electric bullets. Press V to toggle destructive mode.
weapon.electric-gatling-pea.blueprint.de: A blueprint for the Electric Gatling Pea. Automatically converts to weapon when obtained.
weapon.electric-gatling-pea.craft.hint: Left-click to attack, Right-click for ultimate
hud.materials-insufficient: Insufficient materials! Need Battery Pack x{0} and Iridium Bar x{1}
hud.trinket.equip-hint: Equip in trinket slot to use
